ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Cloudy, with a low around 67. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
